item.description:
The weather prediction for Sunday is mostly sunny with temperatures around sixty, so let's try something a bit different.  First a walk, then stop for something to eat or drink.

I'm a native speaker, so bring your questions. 

Please sign up only if you are actually going to come, so I know how many people to look for.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet outside the Porter Square MBTA station, at the base of the red sculpture shown in the photo. I will also send the number for my mobile phone to anyone who signs up before noon on Sunday.

group.name: The Boston English as a Second Language Meetup Group

item.name: Walking and talking
